expertInfo.summary: HSI Session is OFFLINE and unable to get Physical readings suggesting that customer's CPE is offline/switched off. If customer confirms that CPEs are online, then the line is totally down - suspect a physical or CPE issue.
expertInfo.nextBestAction:
Inbound: Advice customer 1) To OFF and ON back all equipment. (If not using VOBB). 2) To check on physical/cable connection between all CPE.
CSP to 1) identify actual customer's issue. 2) check Physical Parameter and current Internet Session. If Internet Session is OFFLINE : Kindly create CTT and CTT Activity.
